metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28948 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Archive_Tar through 1.4.10 allows an unserialization attack because phar: is blocked but PHAR: is not blocked.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-28948` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-pear - 1:1.10.5+submodules+notgz-1ubuntu1.18.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-pear package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.10.5+submodules+notgz-1ubuntu1.18.04.2').
